00095 inline        void CCalibratedViewBase::SetCalibrationPtr(const ICalibration* calibrationPtr)
00096 {
00097        if (calibrationPtr != m_calibrationPtr){
00098               if (calibrationPtr != NULL){
00099                      m_calibrationPtr = calibrationPtr;
00100               }
00101               else{
00102                      m_calibrationPtr = &CNoneCalibration::GetInstance();
00103               }
00104 
00105               InvalidateBackground();
00106        }
00107 
00108        UpdateAllShapes(iview::IShape::CF_CALIB);
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridVisible(bool state)
00113 {
00114        if (m_isGridVisible != state){
00115               m_isGridVisible = state;
00116               InvalidateBackground();
00117        }
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetMinGridDistance(double gridDistance)
00122 {
00123        if (m_minGridDistance != gridDistance){
00124               m_minGridDistance = gridDistance;
00125               if (m_isGridVisible){
00126                      SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00127               }
00128        }
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 inline void CCalibratedViewBase::SetGridInMm(bool state)
00133 {
00134        if (m_isGridInMm != state){
00135               m_isGridInMm = state;
00136               SetBackgroundBufferValid(false);
00137        }
00138 }
